t1 = '_', ':instance', 'have-mod-91'
t1b = '_', ':instance', 'chase-01'
t2 = '_', ':ARG1', 'a'
t3 = '_', ':ARG2', 'b'
m = Model()
with pytest.raises(TypeError):
    m.dereify(t1)
with pytest.raises(TypeError):
    m.dereify(t1, t2)
with pytest.raises(ModelError):
    m.dereify(t1, t2, t3)
m = Model.from_dict(mini_amr)
assert m.dereify(t1, t2, t3) == ('a', ':mod', 'b')
assert m.dereify(t1, t3, t2) == ('a', ':mod', 'b')
with pytest.raises(ModelError):
    m.dereify(t1b, t2, t3)
